DOC.brief_title: Motivational Interviewing Weight Loss With Young Adults
DOC.detailed_description: This study 2-arm randomize control trial evaluate feasibility , acceptability preliminary efficacy MI-based program weight loss young adult . Participants assign either MI Behavioral Weigh Loss Behavioral Weight Loss arm - arm receive 12-week Behavioral Weight Loss program , include 2 individual in-person session , follow weekly Behavioral Weight Loss module , report key behavior , feedback progress relative goal , via email . Session content quite distinct two arm , increase emphasis personalize feedback relative healthy norm , enhance autonomous motivation , choice surround diet activity goal MIBWL arm . Assessments take place 0 , 3 month , follow exit interview help refine protocol .
DOC.criteria: Between 1825 year age . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 25 45 kg/m2 . Men woman recruit . All race ethnic group recruit . 1 . Currently receive treatment Type 2 Diabetes , hypertension , hyperlipidemia , report history cardiovascular disease . 2 . Other health problem may influence ability walk physical activity associate unintentional weight change , include cancer treatment within past 5 year tuberculosis . 3 . Report history , current diagnose DSMIVTR eat disorder ( i.e. , anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa ) current compensatory behavior ( e.g. , vomit , laxative use , excessive exercise ) . 4 . Report heart condition , chest pain period activity rest , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) . Individuals endorse joint problem , prescription medication usage , medical condition could limit exercise require obtain write physician consent participate . 5 . Report history psychotic disorder , bipolar disorder , organic brain syndrome ; report hospitalization psychiatric disorder within last 12 month . 6 . Are currently participate weight loss program and/or take weight loss medication . 7 . Lost > 5 % body weight past 6 month history bariatric surgery . 8 . Participation research study may interfere study . 9 . Intend move outside surround area within time frame investigation town / unavailable three week initial intervention period . 10 . Are pregnant , lactate , less 6 month postpartum , plan become pregnant time frame investigation . 11 . Failure complete screening appointment .
